2084510.name: Pathogen: Survival
2084510.description:
Pathogen: Survival is a wave based FPS zombie game that prioritises progression, customisation and freedom for different playstyles and includes:
- 21 upgradable abilities earned through in game currency
- 19 unique weapons earned through your character level
- 100s of unique skins, applicable to each attachment and element of the weapon, allowing for over 5 trillion possible skins for each weapon
- Character skin customisation
- Round based purchasable attachments
- Round based powerups
- Round based upgradable weapons, with 6 unique abilities (Fire, Ice, Blackhole, Electricity, Fortune, Wind)
- 8 zombie types, normal, spitter, butcher, wretch, baby, slobber, brute, radioactive brute
- 7 Unique maps
- Dash ability
- Adrenaline ability
- Time Warp ability
- Charged Jump ability
- 10 Unique Perks
- Weapon and Character Prestige levels
2084510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
